hadiths.text: Sa'sa'ah said to 'Ali bin Abi Talib - may Allah honor his face - :"Forbid to us, O Commander of the Believers! What the Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade to you." He said: "The Messenger of Allah [SAW] forbade me from using Ad-Dubba' and Al-Hantam

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ نَبِيذِ الْجِعَةِ، وَهُوَ شَرَابٌ يُتَّخَذُ مِنَ الشَّعِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Nabidh Al-Ji'ah Which is a Drink Made From Barley
